subtitleNullable: Tweets from major News Papers and Magazines on Health Related Topics
descriptionNullable:
## Intro
**The data was collected in 2015 using Twitter API. This dataset contains health news from 4 major health news agencies such as BBC, CNN, and NYT.**

## Data Format 
Each file is related to one Twitter account of a news agency. For example, bbchealth.txt is related to BBC health news. Each line contains tweet id|date and time|tweet. The separator is '|'. This text data has been used to evaluate the performance of topic models on short text data. However, it can be used for other tasks such as clustering.

## Acknowledgements
*License: Karami, A., Gangopadhyay, A., Zhou, B., & Kharrazi, H. (2017). Fuzzy approach topic discovery in health and medical corpora. International Journal of Fuzzy Systems, 1-12.*
*UCI Machine Learning Repository*
